# Interface LocalTTSConfigInterface

Interface for configuring local TTS (Text-to-Speech) instances.

interface LocalTTSConfigInterface {  
device?: [Device](/classes/core_device.Device);  
modelPath: string;  
promptsPath: string;  
synthesisConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface);  
}

##### Index

### Properties

device? modelPath promptsPath synthesisConfig?

## Properties

### `Optional`device

device?: [Device](/classes/core_device.Device)

The device to use for the TTS

### modelPath

modelPath: string

The path to the model file

### promptsPath

promptsPath: string

The path to the prompts file

### `Optional`synthesisConfig

synthesisConfig?: [SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface)

The configuration for the speech synthesis

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
